name: Lost Signal (BridgeOnAStick)
description:
Lost on a desolate planet, you have to find your way back to the other crew. The only way to find them is with your signal finder, and hope you don't find anything crazy on the way...

Made for Lost Relic Games jam.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Hold left click to use your signal finder
  • Escape to open menu
